content: you have enough yarn go ahead and work one more repeat of row 1-12 row 1 & 2 k3 p1 k1 sl3wyif 8 sts repeat row 1-10 row 3 k3 m1 p1 k1 m1 sl3wyif 10 sts row 4 k3 p2 k2 sl3wyif page 2 of 3 ©2023 dana fehrenbach danafehrenbachdesigns com little josie scarf by dana fehrenbach ending taper row 1 k3 k2tog knit to marker k2 p2 4 times knit to last 5 sts ssk sl3wyif 36 sts row 2 k3 knit to marker k2 p2 4 times knit to last 3 sts sl3wyif row 3-14 repeat row 1 & 2 six more times 24 sts row 15 k3 k2tog k1 p2 k2 3 times p1 ssk sl3wyif 22 sts row 16 k3 k2 p2 4 times sl3wyif row 17 k3 k2tog p2 k2 3 times ssk sl3wyif 20 sts row 18 k4 p2 k2 3 times p1 sl3wyif row 19 k3 k2tog p1 k2 p2 twice k1 ssk sl3wyif 18 sts row 20 k3 p2 k2 3 times sl3wyif row 21 k3 k2tog k2 p2 twice ssk sl3wyif 16 sts row 22 k3 p1 k2 p2 twice k1 sl3wyif row 23 k3 k2tog k1 p2 k2 p1 ssk sl3wyif 14 sts row 24 k5 p2 k2 p2 sl3wyif row 25 k3 k2tog p2 k2 ssk sl3wyif 12 sts row 26 k4 p2 k2 p1 sl3wyif row 27 k3 k2tog p1 k1 ssk sl3wyif 10 sts row 28 k3 p2 k2 sl3wyif row 29 k3 k2tog ssk sl3wyif 8 sts junior prom dress that grandma josie helped me sew row 30 k3 p1 k1 sl3wyif bind off i used the basic bind-off as follows k2 *pass 1st st over 2nd on rh needle k1 repeat from * until 1 st on needle cut yarn pass tail through loop share your finished projects on and pull tail to tighten social media with the hashtags finishing #danafehrenbachdesigns #dmarieknits blocking soak scarf in cool or tepid water using #littlejosiescarf your favorite wool wash if desired gently squeeze #baahaspen #baahyarn excess water from scarf then pin out firmly on towels questions can be emailed to me at or blocking mats allow to dry completely before unpinning danamarieknits@gmail com darn in ends follow my blog the runaway knitter at danafehrenbachdesigns com page 3 of 3 ©2023 dana fehrenbach danafehrenbachdesigns com
